Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cc10a181d2ce410584dd0558c850a22a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]有了！有了！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
那個就是「[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]發光巢穴[System:Color name="Default"]」！
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]一到早上，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]就會產出能用來當藥材的[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]精華[System:Color name="Default"]。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]不過，發光巢穴要是受到傷害就會損壞，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
無法再產出精華，[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b03b2c3d0404e25921a7646aaa6453e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]所以我要你好好保護發光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]直到天亮為止[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="555516ad9c1146bd834b643da40d66d2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]哎呀呀⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
好像有什麼東西？
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1df53c4295de442780e600deac9e6d8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]這小傢伙之前沒出現過。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
先觀察一下情況吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_04_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="de9193d148cf48e8b857fc7283fe9776" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_06_Survivor" name="Talk"/]咦？數量增加了。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
這該不會是⋯⋯
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_05_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3e9512b38864476a8ead87340c78d3b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]果然沒錯，
這個小傢伙[etc:Wait frame="8"/]應該是新品種的皮克敏。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3e9512b38864476a8ead87340c78d3b0" Scale="1"/]身上會發出微微的光芒⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
就叫它「[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]發光皮克敏[System:Color name="Default"]」吧！
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_06_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="46359dd88d774420948749ad22268b99" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call03" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]呵呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]它好像很喜歡你。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="46359dd88d774420948749ad22268b99" Scale="1"/]那正好，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
你就跟那個小傢伙一起保護發光巢穴吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart_07_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]另外，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]剛才那個星形碎片，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
不如就叫它「[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]發光沛蕾特[System:Color name="Default"]」好了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]把它搬回發光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就可以增加發光皮克敏的數量。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="499ef1b79972477e92a149b21861128c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]那麼，好好加油吧！
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart2nd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ec24aedce1c74ff69faae5348ecbe88c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]呵呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]關於發光皮克敏，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
我又有了新發現。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart2nd_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]發光皮克敏[etc:Wait frame="8"/]能夠發出強光。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/]用[PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]的話，發光皮克敏就會聚集起來，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
變成一個光球。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]一口氣釋放那個能量，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就能放出「[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]閃光爆裂[System:Color name="Default"]」！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6df0326816914b95b2c963a9aec8abdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]如果將光球投向原生生物，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
牠們就會因為強光刺眼而畏縮不前，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart3rd_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="15cda8ec4572484f9cab37714c5c56c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]啊──啊──[etc:Wait frame="8"/]聽見了嗎？[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15cda8ec4572484f9cab37714c5c56c0" Scale="1"/]其實，為了應對將來可能會接到的貼身護衛任務，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
我從很久以前就在教[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]歐慶[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]一項技能。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightStart3rd_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk" lipsync="0"/]選擇你想保護的發光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
然後對[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]歐慶[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]發出請求。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/]這樣[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]歐慶[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]就會[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]在發光巢穴周圍巡邏[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
一旦有原生生物靠近，牠便會衝上去撕咬！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command" lipsync="0"/]在晚上的探索中，只要讓牠離開隊伍，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
牠就會[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]留在原地待機，並且開始巡邏[System:Color name="Default"]。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cba517ad3424624bb6cd5fbfa1d088f" Scale="1"/]你們要好好合作，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
一起保護發光巢穴喔！
Night.Night_HowToDualPhotonHill_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]嗨，新人，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
你聽見了嗎？[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]今晚的據點[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]有兩個發光巢穴[System:Color name="Default"]喔！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9156698240224c93a5db1e2f6bbba815" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]如果能保護它們直到早上，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就可以採集到[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]兩個發光之蜜[System:Color name="Default"]了，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_HowToDualPhotonHill_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]根據我的假設，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]這兩個發光巢穴[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
在地底下應該是相連的⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]只要其中一個遭到破壞[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
兩個都無法產出發光之蜜。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="155f57fa2c254fb5aa49a55af9f0485c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]你一個人無法同時保護兩個發光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
所以請[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]歐慶[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]幫忙吧。
Night.Night_HowToPhotonBall_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b422b1143d1a48cb8b7237380f1bc893" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="GAvatar" name="Call04" lipsync="0"/]你之前在晚上獲得的「[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]發光種子[System:Color name="Default"]」，[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
我已經幫你放到包包裡了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b422b1143d1a48cb8b7237380f1bc893" Scale="1"/]現在我來教你使用方法。
Night.Night_HowToPhotonBall_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]首先，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
從包包中選擇發光種子。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]將種子投擲出去，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]發光皮克敏就會誕生[System:Color name="Default"]。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4382a27fb32f4722a78ed2fa9b71d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]不過它們似乎只會在[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]夜晚[System:Color name="Default"]或[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]洞窟[System:Color name="Default"]才會出現，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_AppearanceDodoro_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4eaae3b4d6ae4fa49062eea758d0afee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]哇⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]好詭異的原生生物⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4eaae3b4d6ae4fa49062eea758d0afee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion/]那雙眼睛⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]牠好像[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]正朝著發光巢穴走來[System:Color name="Default"]。
Night.Night_AppearanceDodoroCave_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="81fba741fa6942c69e3910f8a8ff8921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]哇⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
我有一種不祥的預感⋯⋯[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81fba741fa6942c69e3910f8a8ff8921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]不知道牠到底想做什麼⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
請務必小心！
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e7026956b4024d7f8fceb959d681eabd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]呵呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]差不多要來了。
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6151d3c1253748999d8220f7c29fa2b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]一到夜晚就變得凶暴的原生生物，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
容易受到光芒的吸引。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6151d3c1253748999d8220f7c29fa2b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]牠們會朝著發光巢穴前進[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
所以小心別讓巢穴被破壞了。
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e76ecce2e4b44f6b878b020475395f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]啊，這麼快就出動了！
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_Pic01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7631a81b5d154c778f1cb360a1b35301" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]總之，[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]多收集發光沛蕾特[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]增加發光皮克敏的數量[System:Color name="Default"]就對了⋯⋯
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_Pic02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3622317787ab47b494587f6a1c17d33d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]只要在天亮之前，將[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]不斷進攻的原生生物[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
一一打倒[System:Color name="Default"]就可以了。
Night.Night_AppearanceInvasionGensei_00_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c997a77214384ed19fa50d67c14c6229" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]、[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]歐慶[Npc:EmphasisEnd/][etc:Wait frame="8"/]
拜託你們了！
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightBrokenWasurena:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2e95582a93a74f2ab8c4e4737b85ab45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]⋯⋯哎呀呀，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]發光巢穴被破壞掉了。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
該怎麼辦呢⋯⋯
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightBrokenWasurena_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="e7cbdf75b60b4734a9a071e8a1e7c7a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]真可惜。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
不過，下次再努力就好了。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b5280ef646274ba2bfd60cba2a847993" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]呼⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
總算成功保護了發光巢穴。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6e329c560fec4cdfb87306f0a53e0d66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]太好了！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
成功保護了發光巢穴，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUp_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="da29510751d348b59370bcc92ededd58" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]辛苦了。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
那就請你帶著發光種子回來吧。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2f126c0410d84f0f89d36a4b8c67e21d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]竟然打敗了所有的原生生物，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
好厲害啊，新人！
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="ac9585ba0cd24df9847ad6e3ab5523b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]哇！好厲害！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
原生生物全都消失了。
Night.Night_PodTalk_NightTimeUpMax_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="a7f7394f491c45b9bffef0c3819ec595" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]那麼一共獲得[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
多少發光種子呢？[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="718c5d7ad7a14596b0afaff16ce489c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]⋯⋯哎呀？[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
也能將發光沛蕾特搬運到這裡呢。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="718c5d7ad7a14596b0afaff16ce489c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]從外觀上來看，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
它說不定是發光巢穴的幼體。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="90ae7f2d33144a5390b4e4e6dc21df3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]若真是如此，它在地底下[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
是不是與發光巢穴相連呢？[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="90ae7f2d33144a5390b4e4e6dc21df3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]看來[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]搬運遠方的發光沛蕾特[System:Color name="Default"]時，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
可以做為[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]中繼站[System:Color name="Default"]呢。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aa562e01942b44d6a602f2ce90a6ab43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]除此之外，它還能[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]引開原生生物[System:Color name="Default"]，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
藉此來保護發光巢穴。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aa562e01942b44d6a602f2ce90a6ab43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]它小歸小，依然穩定地散發著光芒，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
不如就命名為「[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]誘餌巢穴[System:Color name="Default"]」吧，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]呵呵呵。
Night.Night_InGame_OtoriWorking_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f72562dabbf04dcaa5f77b40ca712ce1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]好，你就把它當成[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]誘餌[System:Color name="Default"]和[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]中繼站[System:Color name="Default"]來使用看看！
Night.Night_InGame_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Night_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight01"/]不好了！不好了！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
發光巢穴正遭到攻擊！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly"/]要是被破壞掉，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
就無法採集到[Carrot:Hikarinomistu/]了！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9208efaae1084b00ad8fbeb50330ad47" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Night_FirstInvasionWasurenaNight02"/]立刻把原生生物趕走吧！
Night.Night_InGame_NightEndGetPhotonBall_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c62043e20c504953817384a97c133c6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]發光皮克敏來為你送行了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c62043e20c504953817384a97c133c6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]難道說，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
它們想跟我們一起回去救援營⋯⋯？
